E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Ivan Rodriguez
Dear Sir,
Ivan Rodriguez is hitting the ball well at AA Birmingham Barons!
He has an AVG of .313, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Garry Templeton



Date: Saturday, 5/31/1990
Subject: Chris Hoiles healing process
Chris Hoiles is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor
